title: UNKNOWN: Failed to get convolution algorithm
body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

Retraining on DLC with the Google COLAB .py sheet. When I go to Start training the error kicks in.

### Operating System

macOS Monteray

### DeepLabCut version

dlc version = 2.2.0.3

### DeepLabCut mode

single animal

### Device type

gpu via Colab

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output

```shell
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
UnknownError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py in _do_call(self, fn, *args)
   1379     try:
-> 1380       return fn(*args)
   1381     except errors.OpError as e:

9 frames
UnknownError: 2 root error(s) found.
  (0) UNKNOWN: Failed to get convolution algorithm. This is probably because cuDNN failed to initialize, so try looking to see if a warning log message was printed above.
	 [[{{node resnet_v1_50/conv1/Conv2D}}]]
	 [[huber_loss/assert_broadcastable/AssertGuard/pivot_f/_15/_556]]
  (1) UNKNOWN: Failed to get convolution algorithm. This is probably because cuDNN failed to initialize, so try looking to see if a warning log message was printed above.
	 [[{{node resnet_v1_50/conv1/Conv2D}}]]
0 successful operations.
0 derived errors ignored.

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

UnknownError                              Traceback (most recent call last)
/usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/client/session.py in _do_call(self, fn, *args)
   1397                     '\nsession_config.graph_options.rewrite_options.'
   1398                     'disable_meta_optimizer = True')
-> 1399       raise type(e)(node_def, op, message)  # pylint: disable=no-value-for-parameter
   1400 
   1401   def _extend_graph(self):

UnknownError: 2 root error(s) found.
  (0) UNKNOWN: Failed to get convolution algorithm. This is probably because cuDNN failed to initialize, so try looking to see if a warning log message was printed above.
	 [[node resnet_v1_50/conv1/Conv2D
 (defined at /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/layers/convolutional.py:253)
]]
	 [[huber_loss/assert_broadcastable/AssertGuard/pivot_f/_15/_556]]
  (1) UNKNOWN: Failed to get convolution algorithm. This is probably because cuDNN failed to initialize, so try looking to see if a warning log message was printed above.
	 [[node resnet_v1_50/conv1/Conv2D
 (defined at /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/tensorflow/python/keras/layers/convolutional.py:253)
]]
0 successful operations.
0 derived errors ignored.

Errors may have originated from an input operation.
Input Source operations connected to node resnet_v1_50/conv1/Conv2D:
In[0] resnet_v1_50/Pad (defined at /usr/local/lib/python3.7/dist-packages/tf_slim/nets/resnet_utils.py:142)	
In[1] resnet_v1_50/conv1/Conv2D/ReadVariableOp:
```

### Anything else?

_No response_
